Claim: "The cost of weather disasters has risen over time."
Implication: "Modern society builds more infrastructure in areas prone to damage from weather—which is almost everywhere."
Referring expressions: weather disasters, time.  Modern society, areas prone to damage from weather, almost everywhere
Formula: (exists b (IsRisenOverTime(b))) -> (exists e (exists c (exists d ((IsBuiltIn(c,d) and IsAlmostEverywhere(e))))))
